thread.title: Appeals Court Suspends Proceedings Over Trump Travel Ban
thread.title_full: Appeals Court Suspends Proceedings Over Trump Travel Ban

author: Eline Gordts
title: Appeals Court Suspends Proceedings Over Trump Travel Ban
text:
02/16/2017 08:49 pm ET Appeals Court Suspends Proceedings Over Trump Travel Ban 
SAN FRANCISCO, Feb 16 (Reuters) - A U.S. appeals court on Thursday suspended proceedings over President Donald Trump’s travel ban for individuals from seven Muslim-majority countries, after Trump announced a new executive order would come soon. 
The 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals had been mulling whether to reconsider its ruling temporarily suspending Trump’s directive. In a court order, the 9th Circuit said it would put that process on hold pending further developments. Do you have information you want to share with the Huffington Post? Here’s how. MORE:
